$TSLA Polls project Macron, Le Pen to face off for French presidency MW http://on.mktw.net/2pqxZ9W

links.title: Polls project Macron, Le Pen to face off for French presidency
links.description: Polls cited by French television Sunday indicate centrist candidate Emmanuel Macron and far-right National Front leader Marine Le Pen will face each other in a May 7 runoff. Out of an 11-candidate field, Macron was seen with 23.7% of the vote, with Le Pen at 21.7%, France 24 reported, citing early results from its polling partner Ipsos.
